title: How to spam recall
body: How do you spam recall? I have tried spamming b and my X button or S, but nothing works (I have normal keybinds)

replies.body: Press B, right click where you're standing, repeat

Recall isn't really spammable.  Unlike emotes or dances, Recall is an ability and wouldn't meet the same specification.  I'm not a part of QA though, so that's just my assumption! You may want to post it on our[ bug report boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report), just in case!
